comments:
Start eclipse, close all editors, then open one for .c/.cc file. Outline does
not activated automatically (I guess it does not exist at the moment). Type
space in opened editor. It causes NPE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.editor.CEditor.reconciled(CEditor.java:985)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(CReconcilingStrategy.java:79)
	at
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.text.CReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(CReconcilingStrategy.java:54)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.Reconciler.process(Reconciler.java:148)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.AbstractReconciler$BackgroundThread.run(AbstractReconciler.java:200)
This will be addressed as part of the CEditor patch coming for PR 61965
The 61965 patch has been put in.  This issue should be resolved.
